mapper.select: SELECT NVL(SUM(tot_sup_price),0) todayOdersPrice FROM orders WHERE TO_CHAR(created_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') AND com_id =#{comId}
SELECT NVL(SUM(tot_sup_price),0) todayPurchasePrice FROM purchaseOrder WHERE TO_CHAR(pur_ord_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') AND com_id =#{comId}
SELECT NVL(SUM(quantity),0) todayPurchaseQunatity FROM purchase WHERE TO_CHAR(created_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') AND com_id =#{comId}
SELECT NVL(SUM(price),0) todayTranPrice FROM transaction WHERE TO_CHAR(txn_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') AND com_id =#{comId} AND txn_type = 'tt01'

SELECT TO_CHAR(CREATED_DATE, 'DY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN') AS order_day, SUM(TOT_PRICE) AS tot_price FROM ORDERS WHERE CREATED_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') + 6 AND COM_ID = #{comId} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(CREATED_DATE, 'DY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN'), TO_CHAR(CREATED_DATE, 'D') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(CREATED_DATE, 'D')

SELECT getItemName(s.item_code) AS item_name, SUM(s.quantity) AS item_quantity, ROUND(SUM(s.quantity) / total.total_quantity * 100, 2) AS percentage FROM stock s, (SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM stock WHERE com_id = #{comId}) total WHERE s.com_id = #{comId} GROUP BY getItemName(s.item_code), total.total_quantity ORDER BY percentage DESC

SELECT CASE WHEN NVL(safe_quantity,0)= 0 THEN 100 WHEN NVL(SUM(s.quantity),0)> NVL(safe_quantity,0) THEN 100 WHEN NVL(safe_quantity,0)!= 0 THEN ROUND(NVL(SUM(s.quantity),0)/NVL(safe_quantity,0)*100,2) END safe_percentage, getItemName(i.item_code) item_name FROM item i LEFT JOIN stock s ON (i.item_code = s.item_code) WHERE i.com_id = #{comId} GROUP BY safe_quantity,i.item_code
SELECT item_code, getItemName(item_code) item_name, NVL(SUM(quantity),0) tot_price FROM purchase WHERE com_id= #{comId} GROUP BY item_code, getItemName(item_code)
